# Copy Folder

# Description

Creates a copy of an existing folder.

# Untitled Section

text="Type the content"

# Configuration

* 
* Folder - The folder to be copied. Click the icon to browse your Box folders. This field supports String type input.
* New folder location - Select the parent folder for the folder copy. Click the icon to browse your Box folders. This field supports String type input.
* New folder name - The name that you want to apply to the folder. This field supports String type input.









* New folder ID - Automatically generated output variable.
